alert.note: Alert for East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 28 at 9:11PM MDT until July 29 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 422, 475, AND 476... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 422, 475, AND 476... The National Weather Service in Pocatello has cancelled the Red Flag Warning. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 422 Sawtooth Range/Northern Sawtooth NF, Fire Weather Zone 475 East Salmon River Mountains/Salmon NF and Fire Weather Zone 476 Lemhi and Lost River Range/Challis NF. * IMPACTS...Scattered thunderstorms will develop Friday afternoon, with most them being dry. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts over 35 mph are possible.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: East Salmon River Mountains, Salmon NF; Lemhi and Lost River Range, Challis NF; Sawtooth Range, Northern Sawtooth NF
